text: Michael Townley (born 4 November 1934) is an Australian politician. He served as a Senator for Tasmania from 1971 to 1987. He was elected as an independent but joined the Liberal Party in 1975. He was born in Hobart, Tasmania. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Independent politicians in Australia Category:Liberal Party of Australia politicians Category:Members of the Australian Senate Category:Politicians from Hobart
title: Michael Townley (politician)
